des:
Use your voice to control your Danfoss Smart Heating System.

You do not need to create an account to use this skill. 
Simply enable the Danfoss skill by entering a pairing code provided by the Danfoss Link™ Controller or the Danfoss TPOne™ App.

The Danfoss Skill enables you to Get and Set the temperature of your Danfoss Smart Heating System

To Get the current Temperature ask Alexa: 
"Alexa, what is the temperature in Bedroom?"

To Get the Setpoint Temperature ask Alexa:
“Alexa, what is Bedroom set to?”

To Set the Temperature ask Alexa:
"Alexa, set Bedroom to 21 degrees.".
"Alexa, decrease Bedroom by 1 degree."
"Alexa, increase Bedroom by 1 degree."


Please note that the Voice Control works best if you use standard House and Room Names like: Bedroom, Kitchen, Office, Living Room, …
